name: Void Voyage
description:
Take a moment to play Void Voyage and fully enjoy the present moment. Listen to the immersive soundtracks and become one with the world around you while you unlock new lovable characters that will accompany you in the void.  

CONTROLS: 

- Use the left and right directional arrows or the keys 'A' and 'D' to move Left and Right. Use the Space Bar or the up directional arrow to Jump. 

- Press the 'P' key to pause the game and the 'Escape' key to play.

- It is possible to move left and right while in Mid-Air.

- While the 'Super Jump' power up is active, press the down directional arrow while in mid-air to descend faster. 

This is a solo developer project.
